name: Adventuring Gear
description: Standard adventuring equipment from the SRD

items.name: Abacus
items.description: A calculating tool used for arithmetic.

items.name: Acid (vial)
items.description: As an action, you can splash the contents onto a creature within 5 feet or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering on impact. Make a ranged attack, treating the acid as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 acid damage.

items.name: Alchemist's Fire (flask)
items.description: As an action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet, shattering on impact. Make a ranged attack, treating it as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

items.name: Ammunition, Arrows (20)
items.description: Standard arrows for use with bows.

items.name: Ammunition, Blowgun Needles (50)
items.description: Needles for use with a blowgun.

items.name: Ammunition, Crossbow Bolts (20)
items.description: Standard bolts for use with crossbows.

items.name: Ammunition, Sling Bullets (20)
items.description: Lead or stone bullets for use with a sling.

items.name: Antitoxin (vial)
items.description: A creature that drinks this vial of liquid gains advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour. It confers no benefit to undead or constructs.

items.name: Arcane Focus, Crystal
items.description: A crystal used as a spellcasting focus for arcane spells.

items.name: Arcane Focus, Orb
items.description: An orb used as a spellcasting focus for arcane spells.

items.name: Arcane Focus, Rod
items.description: A rod used as a spellcasting focus for arcane spells.

items.name: Arcane Focus, Staff
items.description: A staff used as a spellcasting focus for arcane spells.

items.name: Arcane Focus, Wand
items.description: A wand used as a spellcasting focus for arcane spells.

items.name: Backpack
items.description: Holds up to 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

items.name: Ball Bearings (bag of 1,000)
items.description: As an action, you can spill these onto a level 10-foot square area. A creature moving through the area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving at half speed doesn't need to make the save.

items.name: Barrel
items.description: Holds 40 gallons of liquid or 4 cubic feet of solid material.

items.name: Basket
items.description: Holds 2 cubic feet or 40 pounds of gear.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: A portable sleeping roll for camping.

items.name: Bell
items.description: A small metal bell.

items.name: Blanket
items.description: A thick cloth blanket for warmth.

items.name: Block and Tackle
items.description: A set of pulleys with a cable threaded through them. When attached to a surface, allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

items.name: Book
items.description: A blank book for writing or a tome with existing content.

items.name: Bottle, Glass
items.description: A glass container that holds 1.5 pints of liquid.

items.name: Bucket
items.description: Holds 3 gallons of liquid or half a cubic foot of solid material.

items.name: Caltrops (bag of 20)
items.description: As an action, you can spread caltrops to cover a 5-foot square area. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet.

items.name: Candle
items.description: For 1 hour, a candle sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

items.name: Case, Crossbow Bolt
items.description: This wooden case holds up to 20 crossbow bolts.

items.name: Case, Map or Scroll
items.description: This cylindrical leather case holds up to 10 rolled-up sheets of paper or 5 rolled-up sheets of parchment.

items.name: Chain (10 feet)
items.description: A chain has AC 19 and 10 hit points. It can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

items.name: Chalk (1 piece)
items.description: A piece of chalk for marking surfaces.

items.name: Chest
items.description: Holds 12 cubic feet or 300 pounds of gear.

items.name: Climber's Kit
items.description: Includes pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. You can anchor yourself as an action; while anchored, you can't fall more than 25 feet from the anchor point and can't climb more than 25 feet away from it.

items.name: Clothes, Common
items.description: Basic, functional clothing worn by commoners.

items.name: Clothes, Costume
items.description: Clothing designed for theatrical performances or disguises.

items.name: Clothes, Fine
items.description: Elegant clothing suitable for nobles and wealthy individuals.

items.name: Clothes, Traveler's
items.description: Durable clothing designed for travel and outdoor activities.

items.name: Component Pouch
items.description: A small, watertight leather belt pouch containing the material components and other special items you need to cast your spells.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: Using a crowbar grants advantage on Strength checks where the crowbar's leverage can be applied.

items.name: Druidic Focus, Sprig of Mistletoe
items.description: A sprig of mistletoe used as a spellcasting focus for druid spells.

items.name: Druidic Focus, Totem
items.description: A totem object incorporating feathers, fur, bones, and teeth from sacred animals.

items.name: Druidic Focus, Wooden Staff
items.description: A wooden staff used as a spellcasting focus for druid spells.

items.name: Druidic Focus, Yew Wand
items.description: A yew wand used as a spellcasting focus for druid spells.

items.name: Fishing Tackle
items.description: Includes a wooden rod, silken line, corkwood bobbers, steel hooks, lead sinkers, velvet lures, and narrow netting.

items.name: Flask or Tankard
items.description: A container that holds 1 pint of liquid.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: A metal hook designed to be attached to a rope for climbing or grabbing objects.

items.name: Hammer
items.description: A standard hammer for general use.

items.name: Hammer, Sledge
items.description: A large, heavy hammer for breaking objects.

items.name: Healer's Kit
items.description: This kit has 10 uses. As an action, you can expend one use to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

items.name: Holy Symbol, Amulet
items.description: A holy symbol worn as an amulet, used as a spellcasting focus for divine spells.

items.name: Holy Symbol, Emblem
items.description: A holy symbol emblazoned on a shield or worn as a crest.

items.name: Holy Symbol, Reliquary
items.description: A holy symbol in the form of a small container holding a sacred relic.

items.name: Holy Water (flask)
items.description: As an action, you can splash the contents onto a creature within 5 feet or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering on impact. Make a ranged attack, treating it as an improvised weapon. If the target is a fiend or undead, it takes 2d6 radiant damage.

items.name: Hourglass
items.description: A device for measuring time.

items.name: Hunting Trap
items.description: When you use your action to set it, it forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on it. A creature that steps on the trap must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 piercing damage and stop moving.

items.name: Ink (1 ounce bottle)
items.description: A bottle of ink for writing.

items.name: Ink Pen
items.description: A pen for writing with ink.

items.name: Jug or Pitcher
items.description: A container that holds 1 gallon of liquid.

items.name: Ladder (10-foot)
items.description: A 10-foot wooden ladder.

items.name: Lamp
items.description: A lamp casts bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

items.name: Lantern, Bullseye
items.description: A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

items.name: Lantern, Hooded
items.description: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

items.name: Lock
items.description: A key is provided with the lock. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick this lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check.

items.name: Magnifying Glass
items.description: This lens allows a closer look at small objects. It grants advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect an item that is small or highly detailed. Lighting a fire with a magnifying glass requires light as bright as sunlight, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes.

items.name: Manacles
items.description: These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. Escaping them requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check. Breaking them requires a successful DC 20 Strength check. Each set comes with one key.

items.name: Mess Kit
items.description: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan while the other is a plate or shallow bowl.

items.name: Mirror, Steel
items.description: A polished steel mirror.

items.name: Oil (flask)
items.description: Oil usually comes in a clay flask. As an action, you can splash the oil onto a creature within 5 feet or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering on impact. Make a ranged attack against a target. On a hit, the target is covered in oil. If the target takes any fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an additional 5 fire damage from the burning oil.

items.name: Paper (one sheet)
items.description: A single sheet of paper.

items.name: Parchment (one sheet)
items.description: A single sheet of parchment, more durable than paper.

items.name: Perfume (vial)
items.description: A vial of fragrant perfume.

items.name: Pick, Miner's
items.description: A pick for mining and breaking rock.

items.name: Piton
items.description: A metal spike used for climbing.

items.name: Poison, Basic (vial)
items.description: You can use the poison in this vial to coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. Applying the poison takes an action. A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying.

items.name: Pole (10-foot)
items.description: A 10-foot wooden pole, useful for probing ahead.

items.name: Pot, Iron
items.description: An iron pot that holds 1 gallon of liquid.

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion. The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

items.name: Pouch
items.description: A cloth or leather pouch that holds up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

items.name: Quiver
items.description: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

items.name: Ram, Portable
items.description: You can use a portable ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus on the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you advantage on this check.

items.name: Rations (1 day)
items.description: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

items.name: Robes
items.description: Simple robes, often worn by spellcasters or religious figures.

items.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
items.description: Hempen rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

items.name: Rope, Silk (50 feet)
items.description: Silk rope has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

items.name: Sack
items.description: A cloth sack that holds up to 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

items.name: Scale, Merchant's
items.description: A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small objects, such as raw precious metals or trade goods.

items.name: Sealing Wax
items.description: Wax used to seal letters and documents.

items.name: Shovel
items.description: A tool for digging.

items.name: Signal Whistle
items.description: A small whistle for signaling.

items.name: Signet Ring
items.description: A ring with a personal or family seal.

items.name: Soap
items.description: A bar of soap.

items.name: Spellbook
items.description: Essential for wizards, this leather-bound tome has 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

items.name: Spikes, Iron (10)
items.description: Iron spikes for securing ropes, jamming doors, or other purposes.

items.name: Spyglass
items.description: Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

items.name: Tent, Two-Person
items.description: A simple and portable canvas shelter for two people.

items.name: Tinderbox
items.description: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

items.name: Vial
items.description: A small glass container that holds 4 ounces of liquid.

items.name: Waterskin
items.description: A leather pouch that holds up to 4 pints of liquid when full.

items.name: Whetstone
items.description: A stone used for sharpening bladed weapons.
